Skip to contents
nomatchVE 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

Proposed method

nomatchVE()
Main function to estimate vaccine effectiveness using a G-computation style estimator

Estimation

get_one_ve()
Compute VE point estimate
get_observed_gp() get_matching_gp()
Estimate the marginalizing distribution in the observed or matched analysis-eligible populations.
get_gp()
Get empirical probability distributions g(d|x) and p(x) based on input data
fit_model_0() fit_model_1()
Fit survival models to estimate hazards and predict risk
predict_from_model_0() predict_from_model_1()
Compute psi_0(t0; d, x) and psi_1(t0; d,x ), respectively.
compute_psi_d()
Compute day- and covariate- specific risks psi_v(t0; d, x) at a specific time point
compute_psi_bar()
Compute overall cumulative incidence psi_bar via marginalization
compute_ve_t0()
Compute proposed causal VE estimand given the fitted survival models at a single time points of interest
compute_ve()
Compute proposed causal VE estimand given the fitted survival models at various time points of interest

Inference

estimate_ci()
Estimate bootstrapped confidence intervals for proposed VE estimator
one_boot_ve()
Compute one bootstrap replicate of VE point estimate

Matching

matching_ve()
Compute a matching-based estimator of VE with confidence intervals
match_rolling_cohort()
Perform exact 1:1 matching using "rolling cohort" design
matched_dist()
Parameters for creating a matched dataset and matched analysis data set

Estimation

clean_matched_data()
Get analysis matched dataset from matched cohort
match_adata()
Perform matching and get matched adata back
get_one_matching_ve()
Compute VE point estimate in matched data set
compute_marginal_ve()
Get the marginal cumulative incidence in the treated and untreated groups based on a Cox model or Kaplan Meier curve.
compute_cox_ve()
Get the marginal cumulative incidence in the treated and untreated groups based on Cox model(s)
compute_km_ve()
Get the marginal cumulative incidence in the treated and untreated groups based on Kaplan Meier estimation.

Inference

estimate_matching_ci()
Estimate bootstrapped confidence intervals for matching-based VE estimator
one_boot_matching()
Compute one bootstrap replicate of matching-based VE point estimate

Data

simdata
Simulated dataset

Utilities

estimate_general_ci()
Helper to estimate generic bootstrapped confidence interval
compute_boot_ci() compute_wald_ci() compute_percentile_ci()
Compute Wald or percentile bootstrapped confidence interval
estimates_to_df()
Convert estimates list to tidy data frame
estimates_by_time()
Reform estimates list to a list arranged by time point rather than term

In Progress

simultaneous_ci()
Compute simultaneous confidence intervals for timepoints object
plot_ve_panel()
Plot cumulative incidence/VE estimates
